[[File:Battlepoints.png|thumb|200px|A Battle Point]] ==Description== '''Battle Points''' are the red currency earned from the [[Battle Frontier]] that are currently only used to buy items from the [[Shops#Battle Frontier|Battle Frontier Shop]]. ==Formulas== \text{Battle Points} = \text{Stage Beaten} \times \text{Battle Multiplier}

Where: \text{Battle Multiplier} = \text{max}(\frac{\text{stageBeaten}}{100},1) [[Category:Currencies]]

[[File:Battlepoints.png|thumb|200px|A Battle Point]] ==Description== The currency earned from the [[Battle Frontier]], used to buy items from the [[Shops#Battle Frontier|Battle Frontier Shop]]. ==Formulas== \text{Battle Points} = \text{Stage Beaten} \times \text{Battle Multiplier}

Where: \text{Battle Multiplier} = \text{max}(\frac{\text{stageBeaten}}{100},1) [[Category:Currencies]]
